mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_users (username, password, deptId, email, mobile, salt, valid, createdTime, modifiedTime, createdUser, modifiedUser) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{deptId}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{salt}, #{valid}, NOW(), NOW(), #{createdUser}, #{modifiedUser})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, deptId = #{deptId}, modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser}, modifiedTime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_users SET password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, modifiedTime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
